verses.1: My son, keep my words and store up my commands within you.
verses.2: Keep my commands and you will live; guard my teachings as the apple of your eye.
verses.3: Bind them on your fingers; write them on the tablet of your heart.
verses.4: Say to wisdom, "You are my sister," and call understanding your kinsman;
verses.5: they will keep you from the adulteress, from the wayward wife with her seductive words.
verses.6: At the window of my house I looked out through the lattice.
verses.7: I saw among the simple, I noticed among the young men, a youth who lacked judgment.
verses.8: He was going down the street near her corner, walking along in the direction of her house
verses.9: at twilight, as the day was fading, as the dark of night set in.
verses.10: Then out came a woman to meet him, dressed like a prostitute and with crafty intent.
verses.11: (She is loud and defiant, her feet never stay at home;
verses.12: now in the street, now in the squares, at every corner she lurks.)
verses.13: She took hold of him and kissed him and with a brazen face she said:
verses.14: "I have fellowship offerings at home; today I fulfilled my vows.
verses.15: So I came out to meet you; I looked for you and have found you!
verses.17: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon.
verses.16: I have covered my bed with colored linens from Egypt.
verses.19: My husband is not at home; he has gone on a long journey.
verses.18: Come, let's drink deep of love till morning; let's enjoy ourselves with love!
verses.21: With persuasive words she led him astray; she seduced him with her smooth talk.
verses.20: He took his purse filled with money and will not be home till full moon."
verses.23: till an arrow pierces his liver, like a bird darting into a snare, little knowing it will cost him his life.
verses.22: All at once he followed her like an ox going to the slaughter, like a deer stepping into a noose
verses.25: Do not let your heart turn to her ways or stray into her paths.
verses.24: Now then, my sons, listen to me; pay attention to what I say.
verses.27: Her house is a highway to the grave, leading down to the chambers of death.
verses.26: Many are the victims she has brought down; her slain are a mighty throng.
